title: cmd/go: go list -json $pkg produces megabytes of output
body:
Running `go list -json` is producing tons of output:

```
$ go list -json reflect | wc
  153065  218703 4709313

$ go list -json reflect | tail -50
			"external": false,
			"forceBuild": false,
			"forceLibrary": false,
			"cmdline": false,
			"local": false,
			"localPrefix": "_/Users/bradfitz/go/src/unsafe",
			"exeName": "",
			"coverMode": "",
			"coverVars": null,
			"omitDWARF": false
		}
	],
	"gofiles": [
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/all_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/deepequal.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/example_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/export_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/makefunc.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/set_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/tostring_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/type.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/value.go"
	],
	"sfiles": [
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/asm_amd64.s"
	],
	"allgofiles": [
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/all_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/deepequal.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/example_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/export_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/makefunc.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/set_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/tostring_test.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/type.go",
		"/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect/value.go"
	],
	"target": "/Users/bradfitz/go/pkg/darwin_amd64/reflect.a",
	"fake": false,
	"external": false,
	"forceBuild": false,
	"forceLibrary": false,
	"cmdline": false,
	"local": false,
	"localPrefix": "_/Users/bradfitz/go/src/reflect",
	"exeName": "",
	"coverMode": "",
	"coverVars": null,
	"omitDWARF": false

```
